attributes.action: introduce a sliding sclae of taxation on fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: request mr brown and mr darling to introduce a sliding scale of taxation on both petrol and diesel to ensure that prices at the pump do not exceed £1.00 a litre, with the increase in oil costs the windfall from the VAT and corporation tax on the companies that produce the fuel should be more than sufficient to subsidise such a subsidy and would be greatly felt by joe public
